price: Yeroma gareen lamaan wal argan, gareen Muusaa “nuti [garee Fir’awniin] dhaqqabamoodha” jedhan.
arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: falammā tarāā al-jamʿāni qāla aṣḥābu mūsā innā lamud'rakūna
